resources.string:
버그리포트 기록하는 법:

  • 시작 버튼을 눌러 주세요
  • 오류가 생기는 작업을 진행해주세요
  • 스크린샷을 찍고 싶다면, 홈키를 길게 눌러 스크린샷을 찍을 수 있습니다
  • 상태바를 내린 후 알림에서 멈추면 저장됩니다
  • Venom/BugReports폴더에 있는 파일을 우리에게 zip파일로 보내주면 됩니다
모든 알람과 햅틱 반응을 끄는것입니다. 벨소리는 무음모드로 변하지 않습니다.
통화를 제외한 모든 소리가 무음이 됩니다
방해 금지 시간대에도 알림을 받을 앱을 선택합니다
설정을 적용하기 위해 센스를 다시 시작하겠습니까?
설정을 적용하기 위해 상태바를 다시 시작하겠습니까?
설정을 적용하기 위해 센스와 상태바를 다시 시작하겠습니까?
빠른 시작, 상태바 다시 시작 등
Support us and follow our thread!
You can support ROM development by donating to Team Venom. To make a donation just press the Donate button and buy Venom Tweaks PRO Key. After installing the key, this message will not appear again.
Use full color weather icons instead of black and white ones
Allows you to change the brightness of the capacitive buttons
Turns the screen automatically on when a message is received
Change the default carrier text on the lockscreen
Press volume up to wake the device
Choose a buttons to unlock the phone
Choose to center or hide the clock
Automatically show quick settings when there are no notifications to clear
Add custom text to be displayed instead of the carrier label
Changes the transparency of your statusbar
Enables landscape support on home screen
Select panel transparency on home screen and in app drawer
Hides the date from the notification area
Change the items shown in the power menu
Change background color of notification in notification area
Change background color of notification icon in notification area
Change the app drawer background color
Replace the standard H icon with another
Set any image or animation as a notification area background
Set any image or animation as an app drawer background
Hides the carrier label from the lockscreen
Hides next alarm time, date, time or AM/PM
Choose the volume keys longpress action while the screen is off
Customize the clock, buttons and info line
Allows you to slide your finger along the top of the statusbar to change the brigtness. Longpress to activate/deactivate autobrightness
Customize short press Recent apps action
Customize long press Recent apps action
Use a custom navigation application instead of Google Navigation in HTC Car
Use a custom music application instead of HTC Music
Use a custom phone application instead of HTC Dialer
Allows you to slide your finger over buttons(from left to right) to unlock the phone
Enable fast dormancy. Be careful not all providers support it!
Increases app drawer icon capacity to 5x6 in portrait and 7x3 in landscape mode
Allows changing status bar icons and background
Hides settings button from right corner of notification area
Run custom app when you press on settings button
Run custom app when you press on header
Might increase performance and battery life, but no logging
Allows you to fix UID/GID mismatches
Perform zipalign on all user apps
Are you sure, that you want wipe cache partition?
Are you sure that you want to wipe dalvik-cache? Phone will be automatically quick rebooted on complete!
Customize clock widget apps and appearance
Hides icon labels from shortcuts on lockscreen
Prevent WiFi from disabling at night
Allows you to setup Sweep2Wake if the feature is supported by your kernel
Set the delay for the longpress action
Disable the volume keys while on lockscreen, they will only work when music is playing
Choose an action for longpressing the home button on the lockscreen
Press volume down to turn the screen off
Set an icon in the top left corner of the status bar
Disables the sound when you press the volume buttons
Allows you to set separate voltages for each frequency
Select separate voltages for each frequency
Automatically applies CPU and file system settings on phone boot. Includes boot-loop protection
I confirm the above conditions. Do not show the dialog again.
We, Team Venom, are not responsible if your device takes any damage from undervolting or overclocking. You are using those settings on your own risk!
Overclocking your device, especially in combination with undervolting may cause damage to your device. You are using those features on your own risk.
Add or remove apps from quick launch
Show or hide quick launch on QS tab
Enables support for WiFi N, needed only in few countries, where its disabled by operator policy
WiFi N support automatically unlocked! You can disable WiFi N support in Venom Tweaks!
Allows your own apps to show notifications on the lockscreen
Hides icons labels on home screen
When you connect device to PC, install CD for HTC Sync will be mounted
Change what will be shown while longpressing the header
Allows you to select when NFC must work
Hide or select city for weather in the notification area
Shows a menu button on the bottom or the top of screen
Force Sense to rescan all widgets, if some of them are missing
Select which rotations are allowed when autorotation is enabled
While the screen is off, longpress the power button to turn on the flashlight. As soon as you release the power button the flashlight will turn off
Change/rearrage the items in Prism menu
Use hardware camera key as search key
Action when you press volume buttons with opened notification area
Action when you shake your phone left or right with opened notification area
Allows you to specify which IMEI will be reported to apps
If you want use random IMIE just left this input field empty
Show current data connection speed in statusbar
Select color of network speed meter
Set background color of information line
Use solid background color instead of default gradient
Select solid status bar background color for apps
Select solid status bar background color for home
Select solid status bar background color invididualy per app
The buttons will blink while the screen is off on incoming notifications from specific apps
The flash will blink while the screen is off on incoming notifications from specific apps
Select how much time flashlight will blink
Select how much time buttons backlight will blink
Increases size of workspace grid to 5x5. May break HTC widgets.
Use a custom panel background, instaed of the default or defined in the theme
Allow using solid color or own image as app drawer background
Opens folder incenter of screen, insted of near icon
Enable CRT animation when screen turns on
Enable CRT animation when screen turns off
Switch between fade or old TV animation
Allows you to hide or select a city for the weather on the lockscreen
Allows you to hide or select a city for the weather in Blinkfeed and app drawer
Hides the clock and weather panel in the app drawer
Unlock automatically when the correct PIN/password is entered
Widget is maximized by default on lockscreen
Allow you to add any widget on lockscreen
Disables widgets support on AOSP lockscreen
Removes Camera widget from AOSP lockscreen
CPU freq and governor are controlled automatically. If you want to control it by yourself enable this option
Enable animation when you unlocking device
Allows you to set ratio between news, social and local media
Toggle vertical quick settings by swiping on carrier label
Activate the vertical quick settings by dragging the status bar with two fingers
Activate the vertical quick settings by dragging the edge of the status bar
Enables you to draw gestures in the notificaton pulldown area with custom asigned actions
Enables gestures opening gestures panel, by draging left edge of status bar
Disable appying exchange security policies on your device.
Fades the background while you pull the notification area
Hides icon labels in the app drawer
Change color of labels in app drawer
Change color of labels on workspace
Enable full screen weather animation like in Sense 4.x
Change the background of android quick settings
Change the number of columns in android quick settings
Removes RAM meter and kill all button from recent apps dialog
Allows you to set icon underlays for stock icon theme
Reset theme icons to theme defaults?
Double tap screen to wake up device
Set any image or animation as a recent apps background
Change the HTC BlinkFeed background color
Change the background color of feed items on BlinkFeed
Hightlight color for pressed buttons, items, links and etc
Use swipe up gesture to open all apps
Action for slide from Menu to Search
Action for slide from Back to Home
Change size of clock on lockscreen
Change number of columns in app drawer
Will add a transparency to app drawer
Will add a transparency to the notification pulldown and quick settings
Use custom application instead of the recent applications dialog
Moves the battery icon to the left side of the statusbar
Moves the signal icons to the left side of the statusbar
"Click here to start a step-by-step tutorial how to use pie. Credits and thanks to Basil3 for the tutorial."
"VenomPie is based on LMT. LMT has more features, like gesture, command support and more! HUGE thanks to noname81, who made LMT compatible for us. Click here, to visit his thread"
"Starts the pie touch service - If the pie doesn't work anymore, come here and restart the service."
Pie outline size (just for custom colors)
"Set the icon behavior of mapped apps 0=disabled, 1=enabled (no filter), 2=enabled, >2=size in pixel"
"Set the icon behavior of mapped user images 0=disabled, 1=enabled (no filter), 2=enabled, >2=size in pixel"
Set the behavior of the status info
Set the font of the status info
Choose a color theme from presets
Theme pie how you want to have it!
Set color for the pie tiles
Set color for the pie selection
Set color for the pie icons
Set color for the pie outline
Set color for the pie gradient
Set color for the pie gradient outline
Theme pie info how you would like to have it!
Set color for the pie info clock
Set color for the pie info notifications
Set color for the pie info dim
If enabled, pie gets disabled when the keyboard is open
Add apps to the blacklist to prevent pie from activating
Set the key to be triggered for the pie tile
Set the webpage to be opened for the pie tile
Set the Tasker script name to be called for the pie tile
Run a script for the pie tile
Reset all mapping back to default
Install XposedInstaller to enhance your Viper ROM experience even more
Open the Xposed UI to download modules
Tap on any element to set its color
Notification area, quicksettings and recent apps colors
